sentences.en: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.cn: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

phrases.cn: 伟大的发现；好棒的发现

sentences.en: The focus of recent research has been on environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 近期的研究重点是环境问题。

sentences.en: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.cn: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.en: Today he was able to focus his message exclusively on the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天他能够将重点聚焦在经济方面。

sentences.en: Roses grow well in a clay soil.
sentences.cn: 蔷薇适宜在黏质土中生长。

phrases.cn: n. 水土流失；土壤侵蚀；土壤流失；泥土流失

sentences.en: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.cn: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.en: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.cn: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.en: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

trans.tranCn: 使……免受（影响；害等）；使……不含（有害物）
使……免受（影响；害等）；使……不含（有害物）

sentences.en: Climate change is likely to affect agriculture in southern Brazil, the most important region for crops such as potato, wheat, rice, maize, and soybean.
sentences.cn: 气候变化可能影响到巴西南部的农业，这是种植马铃薯、小麦、稻米、玉米、大豆等作物的最重要地区。

sentences.en: tree roots
sentences.cn: 树根

sentences.en: Allergies are at the root of a lot of health problems.
sentences.cn: 过敏是许多健康问题的根源。

sentences.en: Julie skimmed the sports page.
sentences.cn: 朱莉浏览了体育版。

sentences.en: Underline the following that apply to you.
sentences.cn: 在以下适用于你的部分下面划线。

sentences.en: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.cn: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

sentences.en: A brief summary is given on a separate sheet.
sentences.cn: 摘要另写一页。

phrases.cn: 简易程序；即决裁判程序

sentences.en: He was fined for making abusive comments to the referee.
sentences.cn: 他因谩骂裁判而被罚款。

sentences.en: People were always commenting on his size.
sentences.cn: 人们总是对他的个子品头论足。

phrases.cn: 无可奉告；不予置评；无意见

sentences.en: Hollywood producers and movie stars
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的制片人和影星

sentences.en: South Carolina is the fourth largest producer of tobacco.
sentences.cn: 南卡罗来纳是第四大烟草出产地。

phrases.cn: 发生炉煤气；生产天然气
煤气发生炉；煤气发生器

sentences.en: By 1900, Britain was a mainly industrial society.
sentences.cn: 到1900年英国已基本进入工业社会。

sentences.en: his humour and charm
sentences.cn: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.en: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.cn: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.en: English humour
sentences.cn: 英国式幽默

trans.tranCn: 故事、笑话等中的妙语；关键语

sentences.en: verbal agreement/instructions etc
sentences.cn: 口头协议/指示等

phrases.cn: n. 言语能力；语言能力
言语虐待；口头谩骂；说粗话，用污言秽语

sentences.cn: 非语言交际形式

phrases.cn: 非言语交际；非语言沟通

sentences.en: The children learn through role-play, dance and mime.
sentences.cn: 儿童通过角色表演、舞蹈和哑剧来学习。

sentences.en: They will perform a short mime later.
sentences.cn: 稍后他们将表演一个哑剧小品。

sentences.en: a professional mime artist
sentences.cn: 专业的哑剧表演艺术家

trans.tranCn: 查理•卓别林（英国喜剧大师）
爱德华•李尔（英国作家、画家）

sentences.en: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.cn: 单口喜剧表演职业

phrases.cn: n. 神曲（意大利诗人但丁作的叙事诗）
n. （广播、电视的）系列幽默剧

trans.tranCn: 维克多•雨果（法国文学家）

sentences.en: I have heard nothing from him up to now.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止我没有他的任何消息。

sentences.en: Use blonde highlights to brighten your hair.
sentences.cn: 用点金色的挑染，让你的发色明亮起来。

sentences.en: The morning sunshine brightened up the room.
sentences.cn: 清晨的阳光照亮了房间。

sentences.en: She felt lonely and depressed .
sentences.cn: 她感到孤独和沮丧。

sentences.en: The divorce left him deeply depressed .
sentences.cn: 离婚使他变得非常消沉。

sentences.en: I was depressed at the thought of all the hard work ahead.
sentences.cn: 想到有那么多艰苦的工作要做，我就发愁。

sentences.en: Andy was a good husband, and Nicky was clearly very content.
sentences.cn: 安迪是个好丈夫，尼基显然非常满足。

sentences.en: I was no longer satisfied with the life that had hitherto contented me.
sentences.cn: 原来一直让我感到满足的生活，我已经不再满意了。

sentences.en: It's easy for you to feel content with yourself and the world around you.
sentences.cn: 你很容易对自己和周围的世界满足。

sentences.en: circus performers
sentences.cn: 马戏演员

sentences.en: He was a better songwriter than performer.
sentences.cn: 他更擅长写歌，而不是演唱。

sentences.en: Her reply astonished me.
sentences.cn: 她的回答让我大吃一惊。

sentences.en: It astonished him that she had changed so little.
sentences.cn: 他很惊讶，她几乎没怎么变。

sentences.en: What astonishes me most is his complete lack of fear.
sentences.cn: 最令我吃惊的是，他什么都不怕。

sentences.en: an astonishing decision
sentences.cn: 令人惊讶的决定

sentences.en: their astonishing success
sentences.cn: 他们惊人的成功

sentences.en: By a fortunate coincidence, a passer-by heard her cries for help.
sentences.cn: 所幸正巧有个过路人听到了她的呼救。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, you were out when we called.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我们来的时候你出去了。

sentences.en: An independent study found that the owners are not as badly off as they say, and most are making money.
sentences.cn: 一项独立的研究发现，企业主们并不像他们说的那么经济困难，大部分都在赚钱。

sentences.en: The school is rather badly off for equipment.
sentences.cn: 学校相当缺乏设备。

sentences.en: Most people who smoke began smoking in their teens.
sentences.cn: 大多数吸烟的人都是在十几岁时开始吸的。

phrases.cn: 少年晚期；20岁左右的青年男女

sentences.en: It’s just an ordinary camera.
sentences.cn: 这只是普通的相机。

sentences.en: The book is about ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 这本书描写的是普通人。

sentences.en: Art should be part of ordinary life.
sentences.cn: 艺术应该是日常生活的一部分。

phrases.cn: （职务等）常任的；（待修的船只等）闲搁着的

sentences.en: He was easily bored.
sentences.cn: 他很容易感到厌烦。

sentences.en: After a while, I got bored and left.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

phrases.cn: 螺旋钻孔桩；填充桩；螺旋桩

sentences.en: The pictures are similar, but there are subtle differences between them.
sentences.cn: 这些图片很相似，但它们之间有细微的差别。

sentences.en: The warning signs of the disease are so subtle that they are often ignored.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的警示征兆不易察觉，因而往往被忽视。

sentences.en: a subtle form of racism
sentences.cn: 隐性的种族歧视

sentences.en: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.cn: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.en: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.cn: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.en: Children’s TV nowadays is much more entertaining.
sentences.cn: 如今的儿童电视节目要比过去有趣多了。

sentences.en: an entertaining evening
sentences.cn: 令人愉快的夜晚

sentences.en: a charming little Italian restaurant
sentences.cn: 一家有吸引力的意大利小餐厅

sentences.en: Harry can be very charming.
sentences.cn: 哈里有时候很讨人喜欢。

phrases.cn: 对女子假装殷勤的男子；女子理想中的求婚者

sentences.en: I met a tramp and gave him some money on my way home.
sentences.cn: 我回家的路上碰到了一个流浪汉并给了他一些钱。

sentences.en: A tramp does not see such a meal twice in the year, in the spike or out of it.
sentences.cn: 对于一个流浪汉而言，不论是在收容站还是在外面，如此丰盛的饭食他是见不到第二次的。

trans.tranCn: 遍及；在…各处；在整个期间，自始至终

sentences.en: a large organization with offices throughout the world
sentences.cn: 在世界各地都设有办事处的一家大型机构

sentences.en: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
sentences.cn: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.en: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
sentences.cn: 这幢房子状况极好，全部铺着地毯。

sentences.en: Thousands of people have been made homeless .
sentences.cn: 成千上万人被逼得无家可归。

sentences.en: He’s shaved off his moustache.
sentences.cn: 他剃去了小胡子。

sentences.en: a worn patch on the carpet
sentences.cn: 地毯上一小块磨破的地方

sentences.en: well worn stone steps
sentences.cn: 残破的石阶

sentences.en: Car buyers tend to replace worn-out tyres with the same brand.
sentences.cn: 汽车的买主们倾向于用同一品牌的轮胎更换废旧轮胎。

sentences.en: They greeted each other stiffly, without affection.
sentences.cn: 他们生硬地打着招呼，没有一丝爱意。

sentences.en: Successful people often aren’t very good at dealing with failure.
sentences.cn: 一帆风顺的人往往不太擅长应对失败。

sentences.en: There are grounds for cautious optimism.
sentences.cn: 有理由保持谨慎乐观。

sentences.en: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.cn: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.en: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.cn: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

trans.tranCn: 失败者；处于劣势的一方

sentences.en: Crowds often feel sympathy for the underdog.
sentences.cn: 观众经常会同情弱者。

sentences.en: Just as it’s important not to miss the forest for the trees, neither should we miss the climate for the snowstorm.
sentences.cn: 对于树木，我们必然会追根到森林；对于暴风雪，我们也要溯源到气候变化。

sentences.en: The inside of the bag was lined with soft leather.
sentences.cn: 这包的里面衬了软皮。

sentences.en: elegant leather boots
sentences.cn: 精美的皮靴

sentences.en: The detective picked out the words with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 侦探费力地辨认出这些字。

sentences.en: I have been picked out to represent the whole team.
sentences.cn: 我被挑选出来代表全队。

sentences.en: a handkerchief trimmed with lace
sentences.cn: 饰有蕾丝花边的手绢

sentences.en: lace curtains
sentences.cn: 网眼窗帘

sentences.en: Barry was sitting on the bed, tying the laces of an old pair of running shoes.
sentences.cn: 巴里正坐在床上系一双旧跑鞋的鞋带。

sentences.en: The rebels have cut off electricity from the capital.
sentences.cn: 叛乱者已经切断了首都的电力。

sentences.en: This meat’s so tough I can hardly chew it!
sentences.cn: 这肉太老了，我几乎嚼不动！

sentences.en: Michael told his story between mouthfuls.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔边吃边讲他的故事。

sentences.en: Acting has brought me enormous enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 演戏给我带来莫大的快乐。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, a small minority want to spoil everyone else’s enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，少数几个人想令其他所有人扫兴。

sentences.en: Her arguments didn’t convince everyone, but changes were made.
sentences.cn: 她的论点不能说服每个人，但还是引起了一些变化。

sentences.en: convincing evidence of his guilt
sentences.cn: 证明他有罪的有力证据

trans.tranCn: 直接的；笔直的；率直的，坦率的

sentences.en: The play was directed by Frank Hauser.
sentences.cn: 这部戏剧由弗兰克·豪泽导演。

sentences.en: The judge directed the jury to find Mr Baggs not guilty.
sentences.cn: 法官指示陪审团判巴格斯先生无罪。

sentences.en: Christopher will direct day-to-day operations.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗将指挥日常工作。

phrases.cn: n. 外国直接投资，对外直接投资

sentences.en: The previous year Adolphson had starred in a play in which Ingrid had been an extra.
sentences.cn: 上个年度阿道夫森曾主演了一部戏，在该戏中英格丽德是临时演员。

sentences.en: The film won five Oscars.
sentences.cn: 这部影片荣获五项奥斯卡奖。

phrases.cn: n. 奥斯卡金像奖（著名电影奖项）

sentences.en: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
sentences.cn: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

sentences.en: an outstanding success
sentences.cn: 了不起的成功

sentences.en: The company is an outstanding example of a small business that grew into a big one.
sentences.cn: 该公司是小企业成长为大公司的突出例子。

sentences.en: The River Rhine rises in Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 莱茵河发源于瑞士。

sentences.en: The problem is Switzerland is a smaller country and you can not compare it with other leagues like Germany, French or Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 问题在于瑞士是一个较小的国家，你不能把它与像德国、法国或英国这样的大国的国家队相比。

sentences.en: I felt I was doing well and my confidence began to grow.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己干得不错，自信心就开始增加了。

sentences.en: the film’s lavish costumes and spectacular sets
sentences.cn: 影片中奢华的戏装和壮观的场景

sentences.en: Hallowe’en costumes
sentences.cn: 万圣节前夕化装服

sentences.en: The dancers were in national costume .
sentences.cn: 舞者都穿着民族服装。

sentences.en: Sarah made a menacing gesture with her fist.
sentences.cn: 萨拉用拳头做了个威胁的手势。

sentences.en: They decided it would be a nice gesture to send her a card.
sentences.cn: 他们认为给她寄一张卡片会是一种友好的表示。

sentences.en: He gestured for her to take a seat.
sentences.cn: 他示意她坐下。

phrases.cn: 做手势，表示；做一个手势

sentences.en: You should pay particular attention to spelling.
sentences.cn: 你应该特别注意拼写。

sentences.en: For no particular reason , he quit the job.
sentences.cn: 没有什么特别原因他就辞了工作。

sentences.en: For further particulars , contact the College secretary.
sentences.cn: 欲了解详情，请与学院秘书联系。

phrases.cn: 过分讲究的；难以取悦的

sentences.en: Steve was in a particularly bad mood when he got back.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫回来时情绪特别不好。

sentences.en: The restaurant is particularly popular with young people.
sentences.cn: 那家餐厅尤其受到年轻人的欢迎。

sentences.en: We are hoping to expand our business, particularly in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们希望扩大业务，尤其是在欧洲。

sentences.en: She had met Zahid on two separate occasions.
sentences.cn: 她遇到过扎希德两次。

phrases.cn: 特别的时刻；特别的场合

sentences.en: We had a really tight budget .
sentences.cn: 我们的预算很紧。

sentences.en: She's not only a great dramatic actress but she's also very funny.
sentences.cn: 她不仅是一位伟大的女戏剧演员，而且也很幽默。

sentences.en: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

sentences.en: ...two young children playing on a slide.
sentences.cn: …在玩滑梯的两个年幼的孩子。

sentences.en: ...the dangerous slide in oil prices.
sentences.cn: …石油价格危险的下跌。

sentences.en: The thought seemed to amuse him.
sentences.cn: 这个想法好像让他觉得好笑。

sentences.en: I don’t find his jokes at all amusing .
sentences.cn: 我觉得他的笑话一点都不好笑。

sentences.en: a highly amusing (=  very amusing  ) film
sentences.cn: 非常有趣的电影

sentences.en: The classic example is tossing a pancake so it flips over in mid-air.
sentences.cn: 最经典的例子是摊薄饼的时候，颠勺时薄饼就会飞到半空中。

sentences.en: She told the court she would give a full explanation of the prosecution's decision on Monday.
sentences.cn: 她告诉法庭她将在星期一就控方的决定做出详尽的解释。

sentences.en: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.cn: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

sentences.en: By the way, do you like the Sherlock Holmes in movies?
sentences.cn: 顺便问一下，你喜欢电影中的夏洛克•福尔摩斯吗？

sentences.en: the mountainous coast of Wales
sentences.cn: 威尔士多山的海岸

sentences.en: a mountainous region
sentences.cn: 多山地区

sentences.en: ‘Where are we going?’ he asked in a whisper.
sentences.cn: “我们去哪里？”他低声问道。

sentences.en: You don’t have to whisper, no one can hear us.
sentences.cn: 你不必轻声轻语，没人听得到我们说话。

sentences.en: The refugees come across the border in vast numbers.
sentences.cn: 大量难民涌过边境。

sentences.en: In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.
sentences.cn: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

sentences.en: Drums are basic to African rhythm.
sentences.cn: 非洲音乐节奏少不了鼓。

sentences.en: complicated dance rhythms
sentences.cn: 复杂的舞蹈节奏

phrases.cn: 生理节律；[化]近昼夜节律；日周期节律

sentences.en: What a mess!
sentences.cn: 太乱了！

sentences.en: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.cn: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.en: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.cn: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.en: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.
sentences.cn: 说他撒谎，他非常生气。

sentences.en: She reacted very badly (= was very upset ) when her parents split up.
sentences.cn: 父母离婚的时候，她非常难过。

sentences.en: You have to react quickly to circumstances.
sentences.cn: 你必须对形势迅速作出反应。

phrases.cn: v. 起作用于；对…有影响

sentences.en: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.cn: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥还是要喝的。

sentences.en: You’re drunk.
sentences.cn: 你喝醉了。

sentences.en: David would get drunk and I would have to take him home and put him to bed.
sentences.cn: 戴维常会喝醉，我就得把他弄回家放到床上。

sentences.en: In an official statement, she formally announced her resignation.
sentences.cn: 在一份官方声明中，她正式宣布辞职。

phrases.cn: 财务报表，财政报告；财政决算

sentences.en: Belinda greeted her warmly.
sentences.cn: 贝琳达热情地招呼她。

sentences.en: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.cn: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

sentences.en: the Association of Master Builders
sentences.cn: 建筑师协会

sentences.en: the strong association between the disease and middle-aged women
sentences.cn: 这种疾病与中年女性的紧密联系

sentences.en: Scotland has all kinds of happy associations for me.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰给我各种各样愉快的联想。

sentences.en: She lived in a college dormitory.
sentences.cn: 她住在一幢大学宿舍楼里。

sentences.en: Rennie had eaten his supper in the canteen.
sentences.cn: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

sentences.en: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.cn: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.en: There are only three flights a day to Logan Airport from Heathrow.
sentences.cn: 希思罗机场每天只有三趟飞往洛根机场的航班。

sentences.en: In 1968, the first supersonic airliner took flight (= began flying ) .
